TEXT.TITLE: REPUBLIC NEW YORK <RNB> CALLS PREFERRED
TEXT.BODY: Republic New York Corp said it will redeem on May 1 all 839,700 shares of its Series A floating rate cumulative preferred stock at 51.50 dlrs per share plus accrued dividends, or a 1.50 dlr premium over stated value. Reuter
